content.rendered:
Advisory & Consulting

Budgeting and Finance Planning

In today’s rapidly changing business environment, managing financial performance is crucial to the organization’s success.

Book A Free Consultation

Home

Financial Planning & Budgeting Services in UAE

Budgeting is a fundamental activity of every successful entity. It is a practice of forecasting and estimation of future sales, expenses and profitability. Even though it requires a lot of resources and is a lengthy process, it can help you save up a lot of costs and expenses. It is an effective way of planning your business growth and how to manage your expenses in an efficient manner and reduce inefficiencies.

What is financial planning in business?

Financial planning and budgeting in Dubai estimates the total capital requirements of the company by selecting the most economical sources of finance. This planning gives a total picture of the future financial activities of a company. With the help of experienced professionals, we prepare financial plans to manage the expenditures and fulfill company’s financial goals.

Types of financial planning

At A & A associates, we provide complete financial planning for your business in Dubai with effective strategies to achieve your important financial goals. Successful financial planning reduces risk or any uncertainties that may occur in the future. Furthermore, it helps to maintain good and stable financial health.

Different types of financial planning in Dubai include,

  • Cash-flow planning – Cash flow simply refers to the inflow and outflow of money, for better financial planning, it’s essential to keep a check on the income and expenses. In cash-flow planning, individuals calculate their present and future expenditures. This model ensures that individual or business has appropriate savings at the time of emergency.
  • Insurance planning – Insurance planning is a significant aspect of financial planning because it secures an individual or business from unexpected or unpredictable risk in the future. Keep insurance as your highest priority and take up the best policy that immunes your company from any financial impact that any particular mishappening could lead too.
  • Investment planning – We ensure complete investment financial planning for your business in Dubai. This identifies your goals and prioritizes them accordingly. In the long run, if you like to accumulate good wealth, then invest in different financial institutions early in your business. These financial institutions could be equities, mutual funds, fixed deposits, debt securities, savings scheme, etc.
  • Tax planning – Proper tax planning and tax minimization should be the first priority in your business. Tax planning maximizes your financial saving and tax payers enjoy various other benefits in their business. To expand your wealth, invest in various tax-saving instruments to minimize your taxable income. This gives returns on your investment and your business benefits from tax deductions as well as tax exemptions.

Finally, we perform an internal audit and provide the auditor’s opinion along with the financial statements.

Types of financial budgeting in Dubai

Company budgeting is a live strategy that informs about the business decision. Most of the budgeting models begin with operating budget and other expected costs.

Different types of financial budgeting include,
  • Incremental budgeting – Incremental budgeting simply adjust existing budget by increments that reflect the overall growth or decline of the company. It’s quick to calculate and facilitate companywide budget adjustments.
  • Activity-based budgeting – Activity based budgeting can be effective when the organization have a clear focus on goal-oriented operation. This works in a short-term to meet specific financial goal.
  • Value-proposition budgeting – It’s about calculating the value of your business and maximizing the budget in areas that deliver strong results. This method is used in conjunction with other methods on a small scale or large scale.
  • Zero-based budgeting – This budgeting requires flexible budgeting with line by line justification of budgets and purchasing. This eliminates extra expenditure providing complete control and visibility into budgets.

Benefits of availing financial planning and budgeting in Dubai,

The analysis is a complete package that includes trends and changes in sales, profitability, liquidity, BEP, MOS analysis, changes in cash flow, financial ratio analysis, and variance analysis. At A & A associates, we present the financial statements with great accuracy and assess the company performance for further improvements.

Some of the advantages include,

  • Establish clear company goals for your business
  • Overcome challenges in both receiving and spending money
  • Monitor budget and smart allocation
  • Identify and avoid unnecessary over-inflated costs
  • Avoid and navigate risk from economic crisis to financial fraud
  • Better crisis management
  • Smooth fundraising options
  • Analyze and evaluate business growth

Why A & A associates?

A & A associates provide one of the best financial planning and budgeting in Dubai with an efficient team providing potential financial health.

A&A Associate has all the essential equipment required for estimation and forecasting as well as evaluation of trends. We have qualified costing experts on our team who will accurately budget your expenses, sales and profitability and assist in maximizing profit by recommending changes.

We help our clients in the process of creative construction of financial plan and guide in the complete day-to-day business decision. We will perform a regular variance analysis for your business.

From now on you don’t have to worry about complicated calculations since our team is here to save the day. We will calculate all the relevant variances, figure out the reasons behind it and make suggestions on how to eliminate any unfavorable variances.

Get the best financial planning for your business in Dubai; make your business easier with A & A associates.
